label: Markety Mark
narrative: Markety Mark joined the DevRel Foundation because his product considers the developer segment an important role to consider in marketing campaigns. He wants to better understand what developers are looking for and how to market to them and heard that Developer Relations was a way to grow the marketing pipeline.

likes: Doing a good job in their role and want to find new skills and techniques to deliver their messages to market.
dislikes: Using tools like GitHub or Discord that are intended for a more technical audience.

education: A narrow case study or product page helps contextualize the problems and opportunities when not getting lost in the details.
